import react,{useState,useEffect} from 'react' import { XMarkIcon } from '@heroicons/react/20/solid' export default function Example() { const [newsbar, setNewsbar] = useState(true); const handledismiss =(e)=>{ setNewsbar((prev)=>!prev) e.target.style.display = "none" } useEffect(()=>{ const storagedata = localStorage.getItem('newsbar') if(storagedata){ setNewsbar(JSON.parse(storagedata)); } },[]) useEffect(()=>{ localStorage.setItem('newsbar', newsbar) },[newsbar]) return ( <>
